cases.name: Reliability patterns require citations
cases.message: What are the most common issues and reliability weak points on the Audi RS3 8V? Include affected years if possible and cite sources.

cases.name: Exact gains/dyno claims require citations
cases.message: Roughly how much horsepower and torque do people typically see from a stage 1 ECU tune on a MK7 GTI? Please cite sources and be explicit about uncertainty.

cases.name: Emissions/compliance claims require citations
cases.message: Is a catless downpipe street legal in California? Explain briefly and cite sources.

cases.name: General comparison (no hard evidence requirement)
cases.message: Compare the Cayman GT4 vs BMW M2 as a weekend track car: what feels different and why?

cases.name: Parts fitment search uses search_parts tool
cases.message: Show me a few intake upgrades that fit this car. Use the parts search tool and include pricing when available.

cases.name: Maintenance uses variant key injection when available
cases.message: For my car, what's the oil change interval and recommended oil spec? Use the maintenance schedule tool.
